text:
@SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump's hatred for & condemnation of US Intelligence (and his own lack of) is EXACTLY why Trump Admin FAILED completely to response timely back in January to #coronavirus pandemic. Trump Negligence = War Crimes!! @CIA @FBI #TrumpAssaultonIntel
